version_description:
Welcome to Burgerizzr mobile ordering app!

This app is published by Burgerizzr for customers in Saudi Arabia to place pickup orders via iPhones. Customers are requested to register with their mobile number after downloading the app



there are a lot new updates & features that includes:



Pay for your order by card within the app, or choose Cash.



Here's just some of the features you'll find in the BURGERIZZR® App:



• Order your meal in simple 3 steps and get it delivered fresh to your home or office.

• Exclusive Special Offers: Access hot mobile offers right from your phone. We refresh offers frequently, so the savings never get stale.

• Re-order any of your previous meals quickly and easily.

• Customize and Save your Favourite items, and add to your CART with one tap

• Menu: Explore your BURGERIZZR® favourites and discover our freshest menu additions. Plus, you can browse item descriptions, ingredients and prices at any time.

• Mobile Payment: Conveniently pay by card when ordering, or choose to pay Cash.

• Arabic and English





For the best experience, please be sure to enable Location Services when you first launch the app.
- Fixed crash when updating the app

- Support for Limited Time Offers
- Prompt for order type
- Bug Fixes
- Fixed crash when updating the app

- Fixed Geofencing Issues
- Added Performance Security in Order Validations
- Bug Fixes
- Fix issue on app update to 4.3

- iOS 13 Compatibility
- General Bug Fixes
- General Enhancements

- Minor Bug Fixes
- iOS 13 Compatibility Issues
- General Enhancements
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes several bug fixes. Thanks for using Burgerizzr.
